item.title: Kindle to Notion
item.description: A way to seamlessly transfer your Kindle highlights to Notion Database!

item.title: About

Hi, I’m Felix â€” a fresh graduate Information Technology student at the University of Science, VNU-HCM, with a strong passion for Machine Learning, Deep Learning, and Model Interpretability.

Over the past few years, I’ve been exploring the power of intelligent systems to solve real-world problems, from NLP model interpretability to student performance prediction and medical image segmentation. My goal is to build AI systems that are not only powerful, but also explainable and trustworthy.
